modName: Ocean's Allure - CBBE UNP 7B with 5 Colors
summary: This is an armor with high poly meshes and comes with 4k textures as well as optional 2k textures.   This armor set is for CBBE, UNP and SeveNBase. All bodies have working weight sliders. This armor comes in a variety of colors including blue, black, white, brown and green.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i42.tinypic.com/2uohs48.png[/img][/center]

[center][youtube]fVIryvQRCU4[/youtube][youtube]n1-8mBv8Qqo[/youtube][youtube]H1veKlGTczU[/youtube][youtube]4bI7By819Pw[/youtube][/center]

[center]The "Ocean's Allure" is an armor with high poly meshes and comes with 4k textures as well as optional 2k textures. This armor set is for CBBE, UNP and SeveNBase. All bodies have working weight sliders. This armor comes in a variety of colors, including blue, black, white, brown and green. I can continue to add more colors upon popular request.

Please keep in mind that I haven't had any previous experience with meshing. I made this armor while learning how to work with 3ds max.

The armor can be crafted under the "Leather" category. You can also find the armor by typing "help allure" into the console. [/center]

[Line]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/xfe1oj.png[/IMG]


[LIST][*]Cailenteâ€™s [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/]CBBE body[/url][/*][/LIST]

[i]or[/i]

[LIST][*]Dimon99's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709]UNP body[/url] [/*][/LIST]

[i]or[/i]

[LIST][*]Wast1980's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/]SeveNBase[/url][/*][/LIST]


[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/15mhjb7.png[/img]


[LIST]
[*]Download the main file that has your body type with the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/modmanager/?]Nexus Mod Manager.[/url][/*]
[*]If you want a different color, download one of them after following the first step.[/*]
[/LIST]
[b]If you choose to manually install the mod:[/b]

[LIST]
[*]Download the main file with your body type and extract the archive.[/*]
[*]Paste the Data folder in your Skyrim directory. Steam/SteamApps/common/Skyrim[/*]
[*]If you want a different color, download one after following the first step and paste the Data folder in your Skyrim directory. (Like you did with your main file.)[/*]
[/LIST]


[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2ekovhk.png[/IMG]


[LIST]
[*]Uninstall the main file with the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/modmanager/?]Nexus Mod Manager.[/url][/*]
[*]If you have a different color as well, uninstall it the same way you did in the first step.[/*]
[/LIST]
[b]If you choose to manually uninstall the mod:[/b]

[LIST]
[*]Delete the files in data/meshes/armor/Ocean and data/textures/armor/Ocean as well as deleting the .esp from your data directory.[/*]
[/LIST]


[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2uos4t5.png[/IMG]


1.0 - Release


[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/qyyaky.png[/IMG]


The only known issues so far have to do with the first person gloves. When swinging a sword or using spells, there is some clipping due to the fact that the glove goes so high up the arm. The armor also takes a few seconds to load when putting it on, but this is normal. After this, everything should be fine.

If you spot anything else, please leave the issue in the comments section.


[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/fles8m.png[/IMG]


Please do not upload this to any other sites without asking me for permission first. If you want to convert this to another body type or do something else with this mod, PLEASE ask me before you convert the armor. (This means already starting to work on it before you message me.) If I don't reply within a month, you're free to do whatever you want with the mod as long as you credit me and link back to this page.

[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/12549lg.png[/IMG]


[LIST]
[*]3ds Max[/*]
[*]Headus UV Layout[/*]
[*]Creation Kit[/*]
[*]Gimp 2.8[/*]
[*]NifSkope[/*]
[*]WinRAR[/*]

[/LIST]

[Line]

Thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3526455/]Cila81[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6553681/]Caelrya[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1924379/]TairenSoul[/url] for testing out the armor and showcasing it.
I also want to thank [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3076419/]Nightasy[/url] for his video tutorials which got me started with this armor.
Thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3330686/?]Caliente[/url] for making the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/]CBBE body[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/537675/]dimon99[/url] for making the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709]UNP body[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2304498/]Wast1980[/url] for making the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/]SeveNBase[/url] body.

I know this is my first armor, but I hope you all enjoy it very much.
I plan to make more in the future!
author: Stealthic
